title: Sonic.Mechanics.20Hz.Sound.Neurofunk.Elements.MULTiFORMAT-DISCOV
description:
20Hz sound and Sonic Mechanics present Ã¢â‚¬Å“Neurofunk ElementsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. A collection of forceful Drum & Bass components selected for all DnB producers looking to inflict serious damage on the dance floor.

Produced exclusively for Sonic Mechanics by 20Hz sound Ã¢â‚¬Å“Neurofunk ElementsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ is a hand crafted selection of royalty free samples devoted to the darker neuro style of DnB. Weighing in at over 1 Gigabyte of dirty sounds, this sample pack comes overloaded with tearing basses, banging drum loops and spiralling FX, making it perfect for any producer looking for an edge over the competition!

Also included are one shot bass, drums and FX and multi sampled instruments mapped ready to play for the most popular soft samplers.

In detail producers should expect to find here a collection of 137 Wav loops, including 49 Bass Loops, 25 Drum Loops and 51 Music and FX Loops, 108 One Shot Drum, Bass and FX Sounds and 10 Sampler Presets for Ableton Sampler, Exs24, Kontakt 3+, Battery and Halion.

The sounds inside take inspiration from artists such as, Noisia, Mefjus, The Upbeats, Kasra, Maztek, Emperor, Black Sun Empire, Ivy Lab and many others. Neurofunk Elements is designed to emulate the sound championed by the elite dark DnB producers but the audio inside is suited to many other genres including, Techno, Trance, Minimal, Hip Hop, Dubstep, Trap, Nu Disco and House

So if you're ready to explode onto the Neurofunk Radar, kick start your attack with the hottest sample pack for Neurofunk production!
